name: enforce-insert-issue-number
description: Make sure user did not delete the ISSUE-[#] string that was generated by prepare-commit-msg/insert-issue-number.hook.

name: delete-pyc-files
description: Delete all .pyc files every time a new branch is checked out.

name: new-branch-alert
description: Display a message when a new branch is checked out for the first time.

name: update-server-info
description: Prepare a packed repository for use over dumb transports (e.g. http).

name: format-code
description: Run command to format code and re-add any files modified after formatting.

name: search-term
description: Fail commit if a specific term is found in the code.

name: spell-check-md-files
description: Check files with .md extension for spelling errors.

name: verify-name-and-email
description: Fail commit if user.name or user.email is incorrect.

name: include-git-diff-name-status
description: Include the output of "git diff --name-status -r" into the message, just before the "git status" output.

name: insert-issue-number
description: Insert issue number to beginning of the commit message.

name: prevent-bad-push
description: Prevent push of commits where the log message starts with "WIP" (work in progress).

name: prevent-rebase
description: Prevent topic branches that are already merged to 'next' branch from getting rebased, because allowing it would result in rebasing already published history.

name: fsmonitor-watchman
description: Output to stdout all files that have been modified since a given time.

name: Open your new file and paste the code from the hook you chose out of this repo (eg: verify-name-and-email.hook).
